LanguageData.KFM_TransfertKingDesc: Reassign the king of this pack to another (if the destination pack already contains a kings it will be swapped)
LanguageData.KFM_DesignatorRallyDesc: Set the area where killer animals will meet up before going to fight or retreat
LanguageData.KFM_AlertNoRallyZoneDesc: Missing rally point for one of your maps, Please set one!
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsAllowAllToKill: Allow any animal to kill in pack
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsIgnoredRangedAttack: List of animals forced to melee attack (defName):
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsResetIgnoredRangedAttack: Reset the list of animals forced to melee attack
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsResetignoredTargets: Reset the list of ignored targets
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsSupMode: Supervised mode : Attack only defined enemies
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsManualMode: Manual Mode: Pack will only attack manually selected enemies (button "Force Kill")
LanguageData.KFM_ForceKillPackContextDesc: Force pack to kill designed target
LanguageData.KFM_ForceCancelKillDesc: Cancel current mission of the animal and his pack
LanguageData.KFM_ForceKillDesc: Force pack to kill this enemy
LanguageData.KFM_ForceAllocateAfterDeallocateOK: {0} stopped targeting {1} and now take {2} as a target
LanguageData.KFM_ForceAllocateAfterDeallocateRegroupO: {0} has stopped being in grouping mode and now take {1} as a target
LanguageData.KFM_DesignatorDKillDesc: Force packs to not target this enemy
LanguageData.KFM_JoiningPackToKill: Joining the pack to kill an enemy...
LanguageData.KFM_WaintingForOtherToKill: Awaiting other members to fight enemy...
LanguageData.KFM_GroupPackDesc: Group the pack to custom determined point.
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsHoursBeforeAutoDisableGroupM: Amount of hours before auto disable grouping mode ({0})
LanguageData.KFM_ForceAllocateFAILEDSupMode: {0} cant attack target in supervised mode and {1} isnt set as a target to kill.
LanguageData.KFM_MessagePackKingBonusAttackInc: Increasing bonus by 5% for pack leader {0}, to have killed {1} enemies !
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsBonusKingElectionMinHour: Minimum amount of time before creation of new pack leader ({0})
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsBonusKingElectionMaxHour: Maximum amount of time before creation of new pack leader ({0})
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsBonusKingElectionMinMembers: Minimum number of animals in a pack allowed before creation of a pack leader ({0} members)
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsAllowGroupModeOnlyIfKing: Allow grouping mode for packs only if a pack leader is on it
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsDisallowPackGroupMode: Unconditionally disable grouping mode for packs
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsBonusKingElectionPenalityCau: Time penality before creation of a new leader pack if current one is killed ({0})
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsBonusAttackWarriorNbToKill: Number of enemies to kill before a member of the pack can become 'warrior' ({0} enemies)
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsAllowKillSelfPawns: (Dangerous) Allow pack members to target the colony pawns
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsAllowTargetAllBuildings: Allow packs to target all buildings
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsPercentageMemberNearToAvoidR: Percentage of members of a pack to be close to avoid regrouping at the rallying point ({0}%)
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsDefaultBuildingToAttack: List of buildings that can be attacked by default
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsResetDefaultBuildingToAttack: Reset the list of default attackable buildings
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsAllowPackToAttackStrongerTar: (Dangerous) Allow pack to attack stronger enemies
LanguageData.KFM_SettingsAllowManualKingSet: Manually define the leader of each pack
LanguageData.KFM_ManualKingSetDesc: Force this animal to become the new leader of his pack, watch out bonus accumulated with the former leader will be lost!
LanguageData.KFM_cannotChangeKingPack: {0} is a pack leader, you cant change his pack !
LanguageData.KFM_PackKingDeadDesc: {0}, leader of pack {1} has been killed, the permanent {2}% pack bonus has been lost !
LanguageData.KFM_PackKingBonusAttackEnemyToKillBefore: {0} enemies to kill before new bonus
LanguageData.KFM_ConfirmWarriorChangePackDetail: Warning ! {0} is a warrior, if you change his pack he will lose his warrior status and his bonus.
LanguageData.KFM_CannotTargetStrongerEnemie: You cannot target that! the pack attack power ({0}) is less than the target ({1})
